text: Atahpara tara yakhana ai upadesa bhule gela, ya taderake deya hayechila, takhana ami tadera samane saba kichura dbara um'mukta kare dilama. Emanaki, yakhana taderake pradatta bisayadira jan'ye tara khuba garbita haye parala, takhana ami akasmat taderake pakara'o karalama. Takhana tara nirasa haye gela.
